name: Fast Burger Fury
description:
The orders for cheese curds are coming in hot at your restaurant job. One problem: you're lactose intolerant! Fry other food deeper and deeper to construct a path for the curd to fly into the frier. Click and drag the food into the frier to grow it to size. Press 'R' to restart a level, and the 'Go' button to start the curd rolling. All assets were made within the compo period, using piskel for the art, beepbox for music, and audacity for other sound.

Made for Ludum Dare 48 in 48 hours!
